page.title: 19BEDLINGTON AREA COURIER-Pt 2
page.content:
{Refer to July 18th edition}
Page 7 of the Courier describes a new mineral water company Abbey Water based in Morpeth and the retirement after 40 years of Nora Elliot a laundry supervisor at Hepscott Park. The success of local girl Nicola Davison in joining the International Holiday on Ice show and plans to sell NCB homes to their owners at half price make up page 9.News of a mural competition and a new site for teaching mentally handicapped children form page 11 as well as news of a letter writing exercise at Broomhill First School.Pages 12 and 13 have minor news items and the back page gives news of succees by Bedlington High School pupils skiing in Norway, a raft race and coastal fun run. {See Pt 1 and Pt 3
